Text: Not fake at all, you idiot! Why don't you first download it before you start nagging?
IT CANT BE FAKE WITH ONLY 1 AVI FILE ..ITS A GOOD TORRENT

Finally, a version of this movie with hardcoded subs. The video is not the best DVDRip I have seen but it is good none the less. The one issue I noticed was that the audio was slightly off in the beginning but it adjusted itself shortly thereafter.

Overall:
Audio: 8/10 (5.1 with hard coded subs)
Video: 8/10

Thank you uploader.
I don't want to disappoint you, but the audio is stereo...

Audio Stream
    Wave Type: 85 - MPEG Layer 3
    Avg. Bitrate: 114,92 kbit/s
    Sample Rate: 48000 Hz
    Bit Depth: 0 Bits
    Channels: 2


My apologizes for not catching this the first time. Yes, this is indeed stereo; however, that does not take away from my desire to keep this version. Again, thank you uploader.
